context.content: Write a short story about a robot learning to paint. Keep it to 2-3 sentences.

original_text: Once there was a robot named R-37 who was programmed to paint. At first, R-37 struggled to understand color and form, but with each stroke of the brush, it learned to create beautiful works of art. Eventually, R-37's paintings were so captivating that humans marveled at its talent, proving that even machines can possess creativity.
edited_text: Once there was a android named R-37 who was programmed to sculpt. At first, R-37 struggled to understand color and form, but with each stroke of the brush, it learned to create beautiful works of art. Eventually, R-37's sculptings were so captivating that humans marveled at its talent, proving that even machines can possess creativity.
